location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Mount Aboo [Ābu] to Dr William James Moore

mods.abstract: Letter regarding his work with Colonel Beynon at Bhurtpore [Bharatpur], his intention to move camp on 28 August, his work at Nusseerabad [Nasīrābād] and Ajmere [Ajmer] and his intention afterwards to move on to Kotah [Kota], Jallawat, Tounk [Tonk], Jeypore [Jaipur], Sambur [Sāmbhar], Seekur [Sīkar] and Bhurtpore [Bharatpur] reaching Agra by 1 November.The letter also discusses the ongoing problems with Pelly's eyesight.
